description: This file is a PHP source file that generates a web page for the first step of a home network wizard. It includes header and footer includes, some HTML form elements, and embedded JavaScript for form validation and interaction.

methods.name: getInstanceNum
methods.description: Determines user instance number based on session username.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Sends AJAX POST request to set configuration parameters for the wizard step.

methods.name: next_step
methods.description: Validates password inputs and proceeds to the next step by calling set_config.
